Name: Captain-General Janos Marik
Details:
Born 2957.

Janos Marik is the current Duke of Atreus and Captain-General of the Free Worlds League, after being confirmed by Parliament in 2992 after the death of his father. His rule has been marred by the civil war waged between him and his brother, Anton, that ended with his sibling's defeat and death at the hands of Natasha Kerensky, the Black Widow, and by his inability to centralize the League's military and political might to further his goals.
